about_the_game:
Everyone needs a helping hand from time to time. The Helping Hand Set does exactly what it needs to help you and your party: heal your party members and provide in-game currency! Use these patches and currency wisely as there are only a limited amount!

The Helping Hand Set includes:
・Special Patch 1.0 x3
・Special Patch 2.0 x2
・Special Patch 3.0 x1
・Special AR Code Patch x1

You have obtained the following amount of in-game currency Eni:
・5000 Eni

※You will have to progress the game until you can use recovery items.
※You will have to progress the game until you can use in-game currency.
detailed_description:
Everyone needs a helping hand from time to time. The Helping Hand Set does exactly what it needs to help you and your party: heal your party members and provide in-game currency! Use these patches and currency wisely as there are only a limited amount!

The Helping Hand Set includes:
・Special Patch 1.0 x3
・Special Patch 2.0 x2
・Special Patch 3.0 x1
・Special AR Code Patch x1

You have obtained the following amount of in-game currency Eni:
・5000 Eni

※You will have to progress the game until you can use recovery items.
※You will have to progress the game until you can use in-game currency.

name: Death end re;Quest 2 - Helping Hand Set

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 8 (64-bit)
  • Processor: Intel i5 2.3GHz or AMD A9 2.9GHz equivalent
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: ATI Mobility Radeon HD 5xxx, 1GB VRAM 5000 Series
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 8 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectSound (DirectX) compatible sound card
  • Additional Notes: Optimal 4k performance may require better than Recommended System Requirements
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10 Home (64-bit)
  • Processor: Intel i5 3.3GHz or AMD FX-8350 4.0GHz equivalent
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 960、ATI Mobility Radeon R9 290 or better
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 8 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectSound (DirectX) compatible sound card
  • Additional Notes: Optimal 4k performance may require better than Recommended System Requirements

short_description: The Helping Hand Set includes several consumable items and some in-game currency to get you off your feet!
supported_languages:
English*, Japanese*, Simplified Chinese, Traditional Chinese
*languages with full audio support
